page.title: 05INDUSTRY
page.content: THE MAIN INDUSTRY IN BOZEAT FOR MANY YEARS WAS THE BOOT AND SHOE INDUSTRY AND LACE MAKING.BOTH OF THESE HAVE NOW DECLINED AND THERE ARE LESS JOBS NOW IN BOZEAT.THERE WAS A GOLA SPORTS FACTORY FOR MANY YEARS BUT RISING COSTS AND CHEAP IMPORTS LEAD TO IT CLOSING. TODAY THE GOLA FACTORY IS NOW OWNED BY STRONNG FURNITURE.THEY SELL MANY KINDS OF FURNITURE e.g.CHAIRS,TABLES.THEY EMPLOY ABOUT 20 PEOPLE.BOTTERILLS HAS BEEN IN BOZEAT FOR 2 YEARS AND MAKE DIFFERENT KINDS OF SPORTS FOOTWEAR. THEY EMPLOY ABOUT 35 PEOPLE BUT HAVE 15 OUTSIDE WORKERS.PLAYER SPORTS HAS BEEN IN BOZEAT FOR 7 YEARS AND AGAIN MAKE SPORT FOOTWEAR.THEY EMPLOY ABOUT 27 PEOPLE.THERE ARE ALSO MANY SMALL FIRMS WITH 1 OR 2 PEOPLE WORKING.THEY INCLUDE BUILDERS,GLAZIERS,PLUMBERS.THERE IS A GARAGE IN THE VILLAGE.
